author: Reuters Editorial
title: NLRB's Emanuel violated ethics pledge in joint employer case - inspector general
text:
The National Labor Relations Boardâ€™s internal watchdog has concluded that board member William Emanuel violated a White House ethics pledge by taking part in a major decision that affected a separate case in which his former law firm represented a party.
NLRB Inspector General David Berry in a report dated Tuesday said Emanuel should have been aware of the conflict when he participated in a December ruling in Hy-Brand Industrial Contractors Ltd, but did not knowingly provide false information to the IG or Democrats in Congress who had inquired about his role in the case.
